title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Earth Day Festival
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Special Events     Earth Day Festival                 Crystal Coast Earth Day Festival          Join Cape Lookout National Seashore and more than 20 other environmental educators in an Earth Day Celebration for the whole family. Saturday, April 25, 2015 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Get close to marine invertebrates (like whelks and sea stars) with a touch tank, meet rescued wildlife, make coastal crafts, and discover ways you can help protect our environment. This free event is held at Fort Macon State Park in Atlantic Beach, NC. For more information, visit the Crystal Coast Earth Day Festival's Facebook page. Earth Day Partners:  NC Aquarium at Pine Knoll Shores Cape Lookout National Seashore NC Coastal Federation NC Coastal Reserve Core Sound Waterfowl Museum and Heritage Center NC Division of Marine Fisheries Fort Macon State Park NC Maritime Museum in Beaufort
